Articles.Content:
I have been reading in some threads that there is a mod that gives kerbals you take to space supplies/snacks that they survive off of? I think that would be a great mod to add for realism.

thanks!

Edited January 9, 2015 by RocketScientistsSon

There are several life support mods that add food/supplies. TAC-LS is a popular one (Thunder Aerospace Corporation). I haven't encountered one where food is called snacks though, but no doubt one exists

Edited January 8, 2015 by armagheddonsgw
linked TAC

The "Snacks" mod exists, and it is a bit less aggressive. In that mod, running out of life support causes your reputation to drop, but I don't think anything else happens.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/90841-0-90-Snacks!-Kerbal-simplified-life-support-v0-3-3

It links to parts that let you store more Snacks, I believe. Also a plugin for MKS to make Snacks (MKS is quite complicated, though.) I've never used the Snacks mod, however.
You can configure "Snacks!" to kill your kerbals.

You can configure "Snacks!" to kill your kerbals.

That sounds hilariously, deliciously sadistic!
